description:
SALE TIME! Just in time for the I-don't-want-to-pay-full-price season!

Also check out the FREE, TRIAL version before you buy!

Want to read ORIGINAL science fiction and fantasy stories and see ORIGINAL comics designed to look good on a phone? 

Look no further than Galactic Beacon: Volume 1! 

Our anthology features original essays, short stories and comics. We have an outstanding mix of science fiction and fantasy as well as serious thought and goofy humor. 

NOTE: The version in the app catalog (this one) and the version distributed via Web Distribution are the same. Please don't buy both.

Volume 1's theme is One-Way Trips To Mars. 

Would YOU sign up for a chance to live out your days doing research on the red planet? We have two essays that range from serious to hysterically funny plus two short stories that take very different approaches to the idea of a one-way trip to Mars. 

We also have a fantasy story featuring a duel between a thief (er, procurer of goods) and the long dead architect of an impenetrable tomb. 

Don't miss our "Better Literature Through Science" section where we improve classic literature with strategic upgrades. In this Volume we have Raven 2.0. 

If that's not enough for you we have a photo of the first burial on Mars PLUS a bunch of comics for you to swipe your way through. 

Did I mention there are NO ads? 

If you are looking for a great eReading experience on WebOS, look no further than Galactic Beacon: Volume 1. Seriously. Stop looking! Click buy! Do it! Click, click, clickety, click! At $2.99 that is less than a buck a story and the comics and essays are free!
